name: Escape Prison (RabbitBayGames)
description:
In this Adventure Survival Game you must try to escape the prison, solve enigmas, break free and find redemption. The prison can look like an uncharted territory but if you look carefully, you will find in your cell many objects and tools that may help you in the prison breakout, try to use them or combine them.

Escape the prison is a "Room Escape" puzzle adventure survival game and you are a prisoner under close surveillance, a new Alcatraz. There are jail guards around you and every exit is blocked by computer systems, you must try to solve the riddles and  escape from the prison, break free!

Get ready and try this uncharted survival adventure game, you will find in your cell many objects and tools that may help you for the jail break, try to use them or combine them.

Codes and passwords are scattered all around the jail, find them and try to use them on computers to unlock bars and doors.

Around you there are other prisoners, try to figure out what they want and if they can help you to solve the puzzles.

If you want to try your hand at an adventure game (Jail Break) full of suspense and fun, then try Escape the prison adventure!
